A4.text: The most famous campaign poster presented model Eva Herzigov√° in a Wonderbra gazing down at her breasts with the caption 'Hello Boys'.

A5.text: In 1994 in the UK, the (Sara Lee) Wonderbra achieved a high profile for its racy Hello Boys campaign.
